messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Digest Number 927
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/14/2006 3:21:43 PM Eastern Standard Time, unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes: What s  the date of the magazine?  Wouldn t want to
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/14/2006 3:21:43 PM Eastern Standard Time,
unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes:

What's the date of the magazine? Wouldn't want to buy the wrong one.

Thanks!
Kristie



***************
May 22, with Brooke Shields and babies on cover.

Also quoted heavily in the article is Maureen Carey, who will ALSO be at the
Northeast Unschooling Conference.
Kathryn

Come to the Northeast Unschooling Conference, Memorial Day Weekend, May
26-28, 2006 in Peabody, Massachusetts! www.NortheastUnschoolingConference.com



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
